product_name: The North Face Impulse Active Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Get the lightweight coverage you need for cool-weather runs with the Impulse Active Shirt from The North Face. Its technical fabric is designed to manage moisture and regulate your core temperature.
short_description: Get the lightweight coverage you need for cool-weather runs with the Impulse Active Shirt from The North Face. Its technical fabric is designed to manage moisture and regulate your core temperature.
